title: Men's 500 m - Speed Skating St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 500 m 1948","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":null,"9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"-","12":"-","13":"-","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"-","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"-","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"-","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"-","27":"23.","28":"-","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"-","35":"-","36":"32.","37":"-","38":"34.","39":"35.","40":"36.","41":"37.","42":"-","43":"39.","44":"40.","45":"41.","46":null,"47":null,"48":null,"49":"Men's 500 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 500 m competition was held at the Kulm Rink, Badrutts Park and 42 athletes participated in the event.","50":null,"51":"These results for Men's 500 m - St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","52":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 500 m 1948","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Finn Helgesen","6":"Ken Barthelomew","7":"Robert Fitzgerald","8":"Thomas Byberg","9":"Kenneth Henry","10":"Frank Stack","11":"Sverre Farstad","12":"Delbert Lamb","13":"Torodd Hauer","14":"Mats Blomstedt","15":"\u00c5ke Seyffarth","16":"Halle Janemar","17":"Keijo Lehdikk\u00f6","18":"Antero Ojala","19":"Janos Kilian","20":"Lauri Parkkinen","21":"Gordon Audley","22":"Veikko Kalevi Laitinen","23":"Albert Hardy","24":"G\u00f6the Hedlund","25":"Kornel Pajor","26":"Choi Young-chin","27":"Adrianus de Koning","28":"Lee Hiyo-chang","29":"John Cronshey","30":"Vladimir Kolar","31":"Anton Huiskes","32":"Cornelis Broekman","33":"Jan Langedijk","34":"Aage Justesen","35":"Bruce Peppin","36":"Dennis Blundell","37":"Enrico Musolino","38":"Akos Elekfy","39":"Henry Howes","40":"Giorgio Cattaneo","41":"Gustav Slanec","42":"Ivan Ruttkay","43":"Rudolf Kleiner","44":"Pierre Huylebroeck","45":"Ferdinand Preindl","46":"Craig MacKay","47":null,"48":null,"49":"Men's 500 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
